name: Happy Little Accidents: A Paint Survival Story
name_original: Happy Little Accidents: A Paint Survival Story
description:
The paint is aliiiive! Match the right color with your paint gun and last as long as possible against the incoming wave of paint blobs.

Controls:
Q - Load red paint
W - Load yellow paint
E - Load blue paint
L Click - Fire paint gun

Music is Nature theme sketch by remaxim https://opengameart.org/content/nature-theme-sketch

Done as part of GDK's Summer Game Jam https://itch.io/jam/gdk-summer-game-jam-2020

Team:
Austin Acosta (@doubleAAstudio) - Programmer, Designer
Chris Mendoza (@MaoBoulve) - Designer, Animator
Alex Grant - Modeler
